title: Border Cities / WCO Network
summary: Integrates Menlo Park, Nogales, Tucson, El Paso, and San Diego as cross-jurisdictional nodes in the World Citizens Organization civic-oversight ledger. Extends documentation of obstruction, corruption, and suppression beyond federal capture to binational verification.
